title: AI-Powered Course Creation Software
description:
We are building an innovative AI-powered SaaS platform that simplifies and accelerates the process of online course creation. This tool will leverage OpenAIâ€™s GPT models to help creators go from idea to structured, monetizable courses in minutes.




We are seeking a full-stack developer with strong backend experience and a good understanding of integrating OpenAIâ€™s GPT API, user interfaces, and database management.




Key Responsibilities:




Develop a responsive, user-friendly web application for AI-driven course creation

Integrate OpenAI GPT API for content generation features (course titles, modules, descriptions, etc.)

Build secure authentication and user dashboard features

Create dynamic form-based workflows for 7-step course planning

Set up database structures to save and retrieve user sessions and course plans

Develop admin panel for managing users, plans, and analytics

Ensure mobile and desktop responsiveness

Optimize performance, reliability, and security




Required Skills & Experience:




Proven experience with full-stack web development

Frontend: React.js / Next.js / Vue.js (any modern JS framework)

Backend: Node.js / Express / Python Flask / Django

Strong experience with OpenAI API integration

Database: MongoDB / Firebase / PostgreSQL (any modern DB stack)

RESTful API design & integration

Knowledge of user authentication systems (JWT, OAuth)

Familiarity with SaaS product development lifecycles

Excellent problem-solving and communication skills




Nice to Have:




UI/UX design experience or familiarity with tools like Figma

Experience working with Stripe, PayPal or RazorPay for SaaS billing

Background in EdTech or course platforms

Knowledge of Zapier or Make integrations




What Youâ€™ll Get:




Opportunity to work on a visionary AI-based product from the ground up

Flexible remote work with creative freedom

Performance-based bonus and long-term potential

Collaborative environment with fast decision-making




To Apply, please send:




Your portfolio or links to relevant projects

A short proposal on how youâ€™d approach this software

Resume and availability

title: PayPal Subscription React + python
description:
I need a developer who:

- Knows Python and React

- Can integrate PayPal subscription payments, cancellations, and refunds into our React (frontend) and Python (backend) project.




The ideal candidate will have:

âœ… Proven experience working with PayPal's API, specifically handling subscriptions, cancellations, and refunds. We will conduct a thorough interview to assess your knowledge and proficiency.

âœ… Strong proficiency in React for frontend development and Python for backend development.

âœ… A minimum of 3 reviews with an average rating of 4.0 or higher. We prioritize candidates with a proven track record of success.




Project Scope:

- Integrate PayPal subscriptions for two products:

Â  - Product A: $10/month (recurring payments)

Â  - Product B: $16/month (recurring payments)

- Implement support for both PayPal payments and card payments (processed through PayPal) with appropriate success/failure UI handling.

- Develop frontend and backend logic to handle:

Â  - Subscription cancellation

Â  - Refund requests for payments made within the last 30 days




Budget & Timeline:

- Fixed Price: $210

- Project Deadline: 4 days from project commencement




Benefits:

- Upon successful and timely completion, you will receive a guaranteed 5-star feedback rating.

- More projects will be available for you in the future, as we are looking to establish a long-term working relationship with the right candidate. Â 




When submitting your application, please add screenshots of previous paypal integration backend python code if possible, video will be great as well.




Thanks.

title: Fix Our Chatbot (Python + AI)
description:
About Us

Weâ€™re Humble Hackers â€” a remote crew that builds SEO-first websites and AI tools that actually ship. We care about performance, clean code, and people who debug before they brag. No fluff. No middle layers. Just work that works.




The Task (Letâ€™s Start Here)

- Python

Who You Are (Ideally)

---

ğŸš« Donâ€™t Apply If...

---




> Final Note: This job ad is posted as a micro-task, but weâ€™re actively scouting for serious devs to grow with us. If youâ€™ve been looking for the right team to grow with â€” this could be it.

title: Software like Whatsapp
description:
Weâ€™re looking for a highly experienced software engineer to help us build the next generation of our messaging platform. Â Youâ€™ll need to be proficient in languages like Java, Python, and C++. Â Experience with real time communication protocols and database management is a must. Â We need someone who can work independently, solve complex problems, and has a passion for creating innovative communication tools.

Artificial intelligence needs to be developed throughout the software. Â Chatbots must be developed for handling customer requests.

WhatsApp is known for its simplicity and reliability, so we should start with core features like text messaging, voice and video calls, and group chats. Â You could add some fun stuff,too,like animated stickers, custom backgrounds, and maybe even a built - in meme generator. Â We could also explore features like disappearing messages for extra privacy, or maybe even a â€œstoriesâ€ feature like Instagram. Â Large group chats and channels, WhatsApp for its simplicity and user- friendliness, strong focus on privacy. Â Large group chats, broadcast channels for reaching a lot of people at once, and maybe even a cloud-based storage system for easy data sharing. Â Clean interface. Â Disappearing messages like Signal, but with even more control over the timer? Â A built - in translation tool like WeChat, Â so you can chat with anyone, anywhere. Â How about adding a feature that lets you create custom stickers and emojis right in the app? Â You could even use your own photos to make them extra personal. Â Features, like payment reminders or transaction notifications within the app, rather than full bank integration because of serious security concerns.

Record your life with moments. Â Online and offline payments ( Americaâ€™s mainland ). Â Chat anytime, anywhere for free. Â Protect minors. Â Learn about anti -scam and safety.

You could add a built- in payment system for users to send and receive money within the app, or a feature that lets users discover and connect with businesses and services in their area.

Feature that lets users share their live location with friends for a specific period of time, or integrating a voice messaging feature with fun filters and effects.

The app needs to be made available on Google Play store, Apple apps and Samsung App Store.

title: MVP: AI-enabled, Multi-Tenant Platform
description:
This project is already in progress.Â 




We are using AzureÂ 




What we have so farÂ 




Completed UIÂ 

ELT PipelineÂ 

Azure Blob StorageÂ 

SQL DBÂ 

Auth0 IntegrationÂ 

ChatGPT IntegrationÂ 




Project: Revfinity OS â€“ Multi-Tenant AI Enablement System (MVP)Â 




Overview:Â 




Weâ€™re building a lightweight, AI-enabled RevOps platform designed for multi-tenant environments, with seamless Auth0 authentication, event-driven ticketing, and real-time user interaction.Â 




The system supports role-based actions, task tracking, report building, and Apollo call analysis.Â 




Workstreams:Â 




1. Multi-Tenant Auth0 Integration Implement tenant-aware user creation and assign unique tenant_id per company. Support role-based access: Admin, Manager, Rep. Store tenant/role claims in Auth0 app_metadata and JWT custom claims. Extend Auth0 Actions to enrich tokens. Create secure middleware to block cross-tenant access. Unit tests for RBAC, JWT validation, and permission escalation attempts.Â 




2. Event-Driven Ticketing System (Azure Functions) Azure Functions to detect: CRM/LMS gaps Low-performing calls Auto-generate Enablement Tickets (with tenant_id, owner_id, recommended_action, etc.). Support scheduled or manual triggers. Log ticket actions and ensure lifecycle status changes (Created, Assigned, Completed). Optimize for <500ms execution time and batch limits per tenant.Â 




3. Internal Writeback APIs (Tasks & Training) REST APIs for: POST /tickets/complete POST /trainings/create POST /tasks/complete Validate tenant and role permissions. Maintain audit logs and idempotent operations. Return consistent and secure responses.Â 




4. AI Console Feature Completion Real-time task/ticket delivery (SignalR, WebSockets, or polling). UI notifications for new items by role. LMS and Planner writeback integration. Report Builder with: AI summaries Chart/table previews Save + store metadata File upload module: Parse CSV/XLSX/TXT Inject summary into AI prompt Max size 5MB, type restrictions, malware scanÂ 




5. ChatGPT Role-Based NLP Enhancements Inject dynamic instructions based on user role (AE, CRO, RevOps, etc.). Summarize uploaded files to enrich AI prompt. Respect token limits and fail gracefully. Log context and role injection per prompt.Â 




Deliverables Summary: Tenant-based Auth0 setup with enriched tokens Secure route-based access controls Azure Functions for pattern detection and ticket creation Full enablement ticket lifecycle management RESTful APIs for writebacks across tasks/trainings/tickets Real-time updates in AI Console AI-powered Report Builder with LMS/CRM context Dynamic NLP behavior based on user role and uploaded data Tech Stack: Auth0 (Actions, RBAC) Node.js or Python (Azure Functions) FastAPI or Express (Internal APIs) PostgreSQL / Supabase (Tenant-aware DB) SignalR or WebSockets ChatGPT API Apollo, LMS API integration Testing Requirements: Unit & integration tests for API, middleware, and Auth0 claims Permission escalation, cross-tenant isolation, token tampering scenarios Real-time function latency and throughput under loadÂ 




Timeline: 4â€“6 weeks (MVP-ready)Â 




Ideal Freelancer: Proven experience with multi-tenant SaaS architecture Deep familiarity with Auth0, JWT, and RBAC Prior work with Azure Functions is a must, the entirety of this project is in Azure. Strong in API development and security, data engineering, and ChatGPT prompt engineeringÂ 




Bonus: Background in RevOps, sales tech, or enablement systems
skills: AI Console Report Generation and Writeback to Repo.docx
Internal Writebacks _ Enablement Tickets_ Project Builder_ Tickets _ Tasks API.docx

title: AI-Powered Chatbot Database Interaction
description:
We are seeking a talented developer to create an AI-driven chatbot that allows users to interact with our database effectively. The chatbot should facilitate natural language queries, providing users with accurate results from the database. The ideal candidate should have experience with AI technologies, NLP, and database management systems.

https://www.askyourdatabase.com

I need a solution something on the lines of this url where user will chat with the DB and get the results using AI.
if you have a product with a reasonable price, let us know
if not if you can build one in ASAP basis, let me know

The application you have or will build - login page should be programmed to work with SSO; login api we will provide. the settings page which will have the db connections and user + pwd info will be based on the login api and sso whcih will contain all of the info required to populate the settings page and never show to the user.
User queries will be saved to the DB so they can reuse the queries.
OpenAI integration API keys will be provided which should be saved to a file on our servers and not be visible on the public domain

Query output for user queries should be able to display in tables and on charts, both and be able to export to excel and pdf, on demand by users.

Provide examples of what you have done and provide a cost + time estimate.
Please do not provide a publicly available random ready made code from github.

title: Software like monsterinsights w Google
description:
I need a software like monsterinsights. Â Plug-in for websites to connect with Google analytics. Â We are looking for a software engineer to help us build the next generation of our analytics platform. Â Youâ€™ll be working on a small collaborative team to develop and maintain our core product. Â We need someone whoâ€™s comfortable with front-end and back-end development and whoâ€™s passionate about building tools that help people understand data. Â Proficient in languages like Python, JavaScript, and SQL is a must. Â Experience with data visualization libraries is a plus. Â Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS or Google Cloud is also desirable. Â Okay, hereâ€™s a bit more detail on each of those features:




Real-time analytics dashboards: Â these are live displays of key website metrics, like visitors count, page views, and traffic sources. Â Think of it like a control center for your websiteâ€™s performance.




Customizable reporting tools: Â These allow users to create reports tailored to their specific needs. Â You could filter data by date range, user demographics, or even specific actions on the site.




Integration with various e-commerce platforms: Â This means the software can connect with platforms like Shopify or WooCommerce to track sales, conversions, and customer behavior. Â Itâ€™s about making sure all the important data is in one place.




User behavior tracking and segmentation: Â This feature lets you see how users interact with your site - what pages they visit, how long they stay, where they click! Â Segmentation means grouping users based on their behavior, so you can target specific groups with tailored content.




A/B testing and conversion rate optimization tools: Â A/B testing lets you compare 2 versions of a webpage or element to see which performs better. Â Conversion rate optimization is about making changes to your site to turn more visitors into customers.




Okay, so besides seeing what pages visitors look at, you can also track how long they stay on each page, what links they click on, and even where they move their mouse. Â Itâ€™s all about understanding how people use my site.

title: Automated Drawing-to-Video Rendering Too
description:
Automated Drawing-to-Video Rendering Tool

Description: Iâ€™m looking for a developer to create a framework/tool that renders static drawings into dynamic videosâ€”similar in concept to generative art projects like Geomorphism on fxhash.

Key Features:

Input: A batch of static drawings (starting with a .jpg).

Output: A batch of video files, one per drawing, showing a dynamic rendering process (e.g., stroke-by-stroke animation or generative transformations).

Automation: The tool should support batch processingâ€”no manual interaction required between input and output.

Rendering Style: Ideally inspired by generative or parametric art techniques (feel free to bring creative input here).

Export Format: Common video formats (MP4 preferred), with resolution and frame rate configurable.

Platform: Can be CLI-based or web-based; open to recommendations.

Preferred Skills:

Experience with generative art frameworks (e.g., p5.js, Three.js, Processing, shaders).

Experience in video generation/rendering pipelines.

Automation/batch processing (Node.js, Python, or other suitable stack).

Creative problem-solving and attention to detail.

Deliverables:

Working tool (codebase or app) that takes a folder of input drawings and returns a folder of rendered videos.

Basic documentation on setup, usage, and customization.

Optional: Example video outputs based on sample drawings.

Budget & Timeline: Please provide an estimate based on your approach. Fast turnaround preferred but open to proposals.

Sample: https://www.fxhash.xyz/project/geomorphism?tab=analytics

click randomize to see the rendering.
